scripts.reinstall-dependencies: npm run x:uninstall-devDependencies && npm run x:uninstall-dependencies && rm -rf ./.angular ./dist ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && npm run x:install-dependencies && npm run x:install-devDependencies
scripts.x:install-devDependencies: npm install --save-dev @angular-devkit/build-angular @angular/cli @angular/compiler-cli @commitlint/cli @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/prompt-cli @jsverse/transloco-keys-manager @ngx-env/builder @types/jasmine angular-eslint eslint husky jasmine-core karma karma-chrome-launcher karma-coverage karma-jasmine karma-jasmine-html-reporter lint-staged ngx-build-plus prettier prettier-plugin-css-order prettier-plugin-organize-attributes prettier-plugin-organize-imports supabase typescript typescript-eslint zone.js
scripts.x:uninstall-devDependencies: npm uninstall @angular-devkit/build-angular @angular/cli @angular/compiler-cli @commitlint/cli @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/prompt-cli @jsverse/transloco-keys-manager @ngx-env/builder @types/jasmine angular-eslint eslint husky jasmine-core karma karma-chrome-launcher karma-coverage karma-jasmine karma-jasmine-html-reporter lint-staged ngx-build-plus prettier prettier-plugin-css-order prettier-plugin-organize-attributes prettier-plugin-organize-imports supabase typescript typescript-eslint zone.js
